attributes.action: INCREASE THE SPEED LIMIT OF L.G.VS FROM 40 MPH TO 50 MPH ON A-ROADS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO INCREASE THE SPEED LIMITS OF TRUCKS ON ALL A-ROADS FROM 40 MPH TO 50 MPH,NOTHING MORE FRUSTRATING FOR CAR DRIVERS TO BE STUCK BEHIND A LORRY DOING 40 MPH ON WIDE OPEN ROAD

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
